about_the_game:
Enhance your dream park with this new themed world. The all-new Beyond the Skies of Arabia expansion allows you to bring the wonder and delight of 1001 Arabian Nights into your park.
Soar beyond the skies into fantasy and adventure with Sofia and her newest inventions! Inspired by the tales of Scheherazade, our lead engineer has created some truly incredible new theme park rides to dazzle young and old! But when a malfunctioning teleporter traps some park-goers in a remote cave, you’ll have to help Sofia solve this technical terror and rescue your visitors in two brand new campaign missions.
Wow your visitors with marvels of splendor and ingenuity when you add 230+ new scenery objects to your collection and use the magnificent new sandbox maps as a backdrop for building parks that will become an oasis of fun for any discerning visitor. With Beyond the Skies of Arabia - Theme World, you’ll have all the magic any Visioneer could wish for!

Beyond the Skies of Arabia - Theme World includes the following glittering wonder content:
• 230+ Scenery Objects
• Building Prefabs
• 2 Flat Rides
• 4 Animatronics
• 2 Entertainers and Impossification
• 2 Coaster Modules
• 1 Track Type
• 1 Coaster Car
• 2 Sandbox Maps
• and more

Get ready for the nights of your life!
